text: Pseudorimula marianae is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lepetodrilidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in hydrothermal vents and seeps of the Snail Pit vents, Mariana Back- Arc Basin, West Pacific ==References== * Warén, A. & Bouchet, P. (2001) Gastropoda and Monoplacophora from hydrothermal vents and seeps; new taxa and records. The Veliger, 44, 116–231. ==External links== Category:Lepetodrilidae Category:Gastropods described in 1989
title: Pseudorimula marianae
